mapper.select: /* intrTaskInqy20101010 : 업무일지 목록 조회 */ SELECT T.TASK_CD , T.EMP_IDX , T.TASK_CONTENT , T.REG_DT || T.REG_TM AS REG_DT_TM , T.REG_DT , T.REG_TM FROM INTR_TASK T WHERE 1=1 AND T.EMP_IDX = #{empIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.REG_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY T.REG_TM, T.TASK_CD ASC
